bibl.title: The Memorial Stone of Bishop Joseph III of Aswan.
Nubian Voices II. New Texts and Studies on Christian Nubian Culture

bibl.note: Epitaph of a bishop. Qubbat al-Hawa, ca. 700. - The find and its context. - The text. - Commentary. - Form and function. - Historical context. - Conclusions.
bibl.seg: Renate Dekker, The Memorial Stone of Bishop Joseph III of Aswan.

Adam Łajtar, Grzegorz Ochała & Jacques van der Vliet (edd.), Nubian Voices II. New Texts and Studies on Christian Nubian Culture = The Journal of Juristic Papyrology. Supplements. Volume XXVII (Warsaw, 2015) pp. 5-25, 3 figg.
Epitaph of a bishop. Qubbat al-Hawa, ca. 700. - The find and its context. - The text. - Commentary. - Form and function. - Historical context. - Conclusions.
